attributes.action: We the undersigned petition The Prime Minister to amend the DWP rules to sanction remote signing on.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition The Prime Minister to amend the rules regarding signing on for job seekers allowance wherein the cost of travel to the relevant job centre reduces any benefits paid and is non-recoverable with a system that allows job seekers to sign in remotely via The Internet from home only or for those without internet facilities via alternative remote locations that are set up for this purpose such as from The Post Office etc. Many on JSA have exhausted their right to any financial benefit and only sign on in order to qualify for their Nation Insurance Contributions. In many cases like this where travel expenses are involved, it is causing unnecessary financial hardship. Given that we are living in an age of technology, there shouldn’t be too much difficulty for those at The DWP who have the necessary intelligence.
